titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Messrs Remington and Company

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that they cash and credit 1000 rupees to Pelly's account which can then be used to purchase shares in the new Bank of Bombay and detailing a number of shares, dividends and other sources which can be cashed to raise further funds:Interest warrant No. 71 in the Bombay, Baroda and Central India Railway for 125 rupeesOrder on Messrs Smith, Elder for Â£100Cheque on Bombay Bank 500 rupeesRailway stock to be sold 5000 rupeesDividend on ten shares in Elphinstone Land Company to be realised
